name: Adventure Map Mount Revelstoke N.P. Map
description: Mount Revelstoke National Park provides a wonderful variety of hiking and backpacking trails, stunning sub-alpine and alpine scenery, and plentiful wildlife. At a scale 1:50,000 with 25-metre contours, this map shows tree lines, avalanche slopes, rocky ground, and glacial and water features. Includes detailed inset of the base of the Parkway, the town of Revelstoke, and the Summit area.
